Template Function specific_heat_water¶

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
float_t specific_heat_water(float_t T)¶

Specific heat capacity of liquid water in . From Pruppacher and Klett (1997), equations 3-15 and 3-16 Validity range:

Return

Specific heat capacity

Parameters

  • T: Temperature in Kelvin
